issue.title: [Java][CI] Add testing to current java-jars builds and extend to JDK 11 and 17
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16640](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16640). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed on <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13157#issuecomment-1132907282> when we execute the crossbow build to the java-jars task we are not testing the built jars. Currently we are also only building the jars for JDK 1.8. We should both:
 \* Run Java tests over the built jars
 \* Build jars for other JDKs supported (11 and 17)
